overview: Videos: 01. Like Light To The Flies 02. Pull Harder On The Strings Of Your Martyr 03. A Gunshot To The Head Of Trepidation 04. Rain  Live At The Astoria: 01. Rain 02. Dying in your Arms 03. Like Light to the Flies 04. A Gunshot To The Head Of Trepidation 05. Pull Harder On The Strings Of Your Martyr
tagline: The DVD features four promo videos, including the previously unseen "Rain", plus five live tracks recorded in the U.K. in September 2005.
title: Trivium - Ascendancy (Bonus DVD)
